summary: This add a spell that makes your companion's invulnerable when in combat
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][center][b]S[/b]afety [b]F[/b]irst[/center][/size]


[b][size=4] D[/size][/b][size=4]escription[/size]
[size=2][i]

Just a simple mod that you won't deal damage to your allies or anyone that is not Hostile towards you (ONLY WHEN IN COMBAT)
Guards, Summons, Followers all of them.
[/i][/size]

[line]
[b][size=4] I[/size][/b][size=4]nstallation[/size][size=2]

Install it with NMM
For manual users just drag and drop the files to your Data Directory
[/size]

[line]
[b][size=4] U[/size][/b][size=4]ninstall[/size][b][size=4]/U[/size][/b][size=4]pgrading[/size]

Remove the Spell through the Book then you're good to go

[line]
[b][size=4] C[/size][/b][size=4]ompatibility[/size]
[size=2]
It should work on all types of NPC/Creature[/size]

[line]
[b][size=4] H[/size][/b][size=4]ow to use it?[/size]
[size=2]
1. After installing, the book will be add automatically to your inventory

2. Find the book called "Safety First"

3. Just read it then wait for the message box

4. Enjoy![/size]
